name: Spong Trouble
description:
NOTE: If you are having technical difficulties with the web version, then try the desktop version.

This is the Compo entry for Ludum Dare 31. I simply made pong with some additional mechanics, particularly speed powerups.

Recommended to play with 2 controllers.

Controls

Player 1: Left Stick or A and D

Player 2: Left Stick or J and L
